aboutpara: A business-minded, application developer with the drive to create applications that run on web browsers, mobile devices, and other related platforms. I believe that someone should hire me because I can provide leadership, loyalty, focus and overall, dedication to my position. I am also determined to become the best in my field because I believe the person who hires me deserves an expert developer who is at the pinnacle of his career.
